title: The Man, The Moon And The Marriage Vow
description: WHAT EVERY WOMAN WANTS...is what Evie Jones has wanted all her life; husband, children, the white picket fence. But these ordinary wishes have eluded her miserably because Evie is far from ordinary. Erik Riggins, with his ready-made family, could be the answer to Evie's prayers. In him, she's learned to believe in moonlight and magic and the power of motherhood! He's got her hoping for a miracle but can he deliver?
author: Christine Rimmer
